steps.title: Dashboard Menu
steps.text: The menu tabs give you quick access to a set of core elements of the platform, namely Projects, Tutorials and Services.
Any Project is accessible via the Dashboard. The Projects, which belong to or are shared with you, can be found here.

Clicking on a Tutorial will create a copy of that Project, which will appear in your own Projects tab with the same name as the Tutorial. Any changes you make to this copy will not affect the original Tutorial.

Every Project in Sim4Life is composed of at lease one so-called Service.
Services are building blocks for Projects and can provide data/files, visualize results (2D, 3D), implement code in Jupyter notebooks or perform computations to execute simulations within a Project.
By clicking on the Bell, you will you see notifications about which Projects, Credits and Organizations have been shared with you.
Under the question mark, you find Manuals, Support and ways to give us Feedback. It also provides quick access to other Guided Tours.
The User Menu gives you access to Your Account, Billing Center, Preferences, Organizations and more.

projects.description: All you need to know about Project handling

steps.title: Start Sim4Life
steps.text: Clicking on this (+) Start Sim4Life button, allows you to create and open a new Sim4Life project

steps.title: Filter and Search
steps.text:
This tool allows you to filter Projects, Tutorials and Services.
You can search and filter by:
- Title, description, owner, id...
- Tags
- Shared with

steps.title: More options button
steps.text: On the Project card, you can use the three dots button to access more information and operation on the Project.

steps.title: Update Services
steps.text: On the Project card, you can use the Update button to update the corresponding service to the latest version.
